nodes.text: A reputation merit was a digital point system which indicated that a bounty hunter has successfully accomplished a mission. Around 9 ABY, the IG-series droid bounty hunter IG-11 insisted that he must receive reputation merits from the Bounty Hunters' Guild before agreeing to join forces with the bounty hunter known as the Mandalorian on a mission on Arvala-7 to recover "the asset".
